Suspend 3–{3}{U}{U} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {3}{U}{U} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Whenever a time counter is removed from Emanation of Reflections while it’s exiled, create a token that’s a copy of a nonland permanent you control, except it’s an enchantment in addition to its other types.
